inclusion.criterion: bone marrow plasmacytosis with >= 10% plasma cells or sheets of plasma cells
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: symptomatic disease at initial diagnosis that prompted the initiation of therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: end-organ damage at the time of diagnosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: serum free light chain assay performed within 28 days prior to randomization
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: kappa free light chain performed within 28 days prior to randomization
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: lambda free light chain performed within 28 days prior to randomization
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: urine protein electrophoresis (UPEP) performed within 28 days prior to randomization
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis. She is on hemodialysis for ESRD and has been treated with various therapies, including melphalan, prednisone, VAD regimen, autologous stem cell transplant, thalidomide, and velcade.
